resources.string:
v2.2.07-01
 The Active911 registration process has been changed so that will now work with the European server. If you are using Cadpage with Active911 in Europe, you will need to unregister from Active911, the re-register appending "EU" to the end of your old activation code.
 
 New Locations:
 Cochise County, AZ
 Boone County, KY (alt)
 Otsego County, MI
 Burlington County, NJ (alt)
 Caldedonia County, VT (alt)
 
 Location Fixes:
 Kane County, IL
 Parke County, IN
 Johnson County, KS
 Allegen County, MI
 Nassau County, NY
 Onslow County, NC
 Summit County, OH
 Josephine County, OR
 Walworth County, WI
 Vancouver Island, BC Canada

 Location Fixes:

 v2.2.06-03
 New Locations:

 Dewey County, SD
 Hill County, TX
 
 Location Fixes:

 Cumberland County, NJ
 
 v2.2.06-02
 Location Fixes:
 New Haven County, CT
 Travis County, TX
 
 v2.2.06-01
 Fixed problem with the option to initiate a phone call to report your response status not working reliable since Android 10. If you have Cadpage configured to use this option, you will be requested to install a new version of the Cadpage message support app to make this work.
